alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock, northwestern Holt, southeastern Keya Paha and southwestern Boyd Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 603 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Newport to 9 miles northeast of Atkinson. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Stuart, Newport, Midway and Mariaville. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 269 and 294. Highway 281 between mile markers 200 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
